abstract: A number of Silicon Valley companies including Apple, Google and Intel are being investigated over agreements not to recruit each other’s employees.
snippet: A number of Silicon Valley companies including Apple, Google and Intel are being investigated over agreements not to recruit each other’s employees.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  A number of Silicon Valley companies including Apple, Google and Intel are in advanced negotiations with the Justice Department to avoid facing charges that they violated antitrust laws by agreeing not to poach employees from each other, according to two people briefed on the negotiations.

headline.main: Tech Firms Said to Be in Talks to Settle Inquiry Over Recruiting
headline.print_headline: Tech Firms Said to Be in Talks to Settle Inquiry Over Recruiting
